LBX 35 NNE PSX 30 E BAZ 60 WNW AUS 50 SE BWD 30 NW CRS 20 SW PRX 20
ESE DEQ 40 NNE ELD 10 WNW GLH 40 SSE GWO 15 WNW MEI PIB 60 SW HUM.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 55 NNE BRO 25 NNW COT
25 N JCT ABI 20 WNW LTS 20 SSE PNC 10 WNW SLO 45 WNW LUK 40 WSW UNI
